credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Charles T. Cook
dimensions:
Overall: 3 7/8 in. (9.9 cm)
rim: 11/16 in. (1.7 cm)
title: Small Unguentarium (perfume bottle)
description: Fairly thick natural greenish-blue glass. Elongated, drop-shaped body. Irregular cut-and-polished rim. Wider cylindrical neck with constriction at bottom. Glass thickens toward rounded base. Incrustation inside, some iridescence and patches of creamy weathering.
